name: Le Bout de Moi
description: A game made for Intermediate Game Design by a classmate (Mr. Heywood, for the sake of crediting him) and me! It's a simple Twine game based on the 1960 French film A Bout de Souffle (Breathless). Le Bout de Moi is supposed to be a sneak peek into what we believe the sequel of this movie would look like!
